channel.title: [317] Server HELP needed ! please read :) [317]
channel.description:
Hi everyone. i tried for the past 3 days to get my server online, but no success. ive got some pics to explain.
basically, my source runs fine, and my servers online. i got no-ip DUC running, with my server selected, and all is fine. then i went to google.com and createda webclient, and entered my no-ip adress for the client. so far so good. bu then, as i load the client, weird errors appear on my Source cmd, and when i try to connect it says server may be online, but i checked on rs-ps and they said my servers online. so, i decided to try it on another computer, which doest have all the files on. i got to the webpage, and licked login, and all it ever says is "no response from server, try another world"
Can Someone Please help me with this, ive spent nearly 4 days trying to fix this, but no success. I would really appreciate any help :) cheers
Pics: [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/2733/1sourcefine.jpg[/img] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/6507/2serveronline.jpg[/img] [img]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/7818/3end0.jpg[/img]
thanks again

item.title: [317] Server HELP needed ! please read :) [317]
item.dc:creator: @I_Desiredpkz_I I_Desiredpkz_I
item.description:
@I_Desiredpkz_I wrote:

Did you portforward it correctly?
did you use umm utorrent?
cause, i have been trying to portforward with utorrent lately, and when i try to connect i have same thing… have to use hamachi or soemthing… i would recommend just doing the router way… with port 43594

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Server HELP needed ! please read :) [317]
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy1231 Jeremy1231
item.description:
@Jeremy1231 wrote:

i changed ip to 127.0.0.1 for rs-ps.org …still nothing. SOMEONE PLS HELP!!

ty

item.title: [317] Server HELP needed ! please read :) [317]

item.description:
@dwinnerzscape wrote:

Maybe your webclient is connecting to ur local host??

item.title: [317] Server HELP needed ! please read :) [317]
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy1231 Jeremy1231
item.description:
@Jeremy1231 wrote:

EDIT:: i made a local webclient, but i cant login, its logs in and straight back out… when i check my CMD it says 127.0.0.1 is an invalid host? in my server client.java it has my no-ip and local host, and the local webclient i made has 127.0.0.1… help plox? --> shall i change port to 5555 or keep as 43594 for the localhost one?

can u pls explain a bit more, cos i dont really understand :(… and what do the players play on?

cheers

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Server HELP needed ! please read :) [317]
item.dc:creator: @za09za05 za09za05
item.description:
@za09za05 wrote:

when you’re hosting you need to use a local host ip-address such as 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 make a seperate webclient for that and then leave the other webclient for the players

Read full topic

Hi everyone. i tried for the past 3 days to get my server online, but no success. ive got some pics to explain.

basically, my source runs fine, and my servers online. i got no-ip DUC running, with my server selected, and all is fine.
then i went to google.com and createda webclient, and entered my no-ip adress for the client. so far so good. bu then, as i load the client, weird errors appear on my Source cmd, and when i try to connect it says server may be online, but i checked on rs-ps and they said my servers online.
so, i decided to try it on another computer, which doest have all the files on. i got to the webpage, and licked login, and all it ever says is “no response from server, try another world”
